edu.colorado.cires.cmg.mvt.adapt.jts

Class MvtReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.colorado.cires.cmg.mvt.adapt.jts.MvtReader

  • public final class MvtReader
extends Object
    Load Mapbox Vector Tiles (MVT) to JTS Geometry. Feature tags may be converted to user data via ITagConverter.
    See Also:
    JtsMvt, JtsLayer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MvtReader.RingClassifier
      Classifies Polygon and MultiPolygon rings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MvtReader.RingClassifier RING_CLASSIFIER_V1
      Area for surveyor formula may be positive or negative for exterior rings.
      static MvtReader.RingClassifier RING_CLASSIFIER_V2_1
      Area from surveyor formula must be positive for exterior rings.

    • Field Detail

      • RING_CLASSIFIER_V1

        public static final MvtReader.RingClassifier RING_CLASSIFIER_V1
        Area for surveyor formula may be positive or negative for exterior rings. Mimics Mapbox parsers supporting V1.

      • RING_CLASSIFIER_V2_1

        public static final MvtReader.RingClassifier RING_CLASSIFIER_V2_1
        Area from surveyor formula must be positive for exterior rings. Obeys V2.1 spec.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MvtReader

        public MvtReader()

    • Method Detail

      • loadMvt

        public static JtsMvt loadMvt(File file,
                             org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory geomFactory,
                             ITagConverter tagConverter)
                      throws IOException
        Convenience method for loading MVT from file. See loadMvt(InputStream, GeometryFactory, ITagConverter, RingClassifier). Uses RING_CLASSIFIER_V2_1 for forming Polygons and MultiPolygons.
        Parameters:
        file - path to the MVT
        geomFactory - allows for JTS geometry creation
        tagConverter - converts MVT feature tags to JTS user data object
        Returns:
        JTS MVT with geometry in MVT coordinates
        Throws:
        IOException - failure reading MVT from path
        See Also:
        loadMvt(InputStream, GeometryFactory, ITagConverter, RingClassifier), Geometry, Geometry.getUserData(), MvtReader.RingClassifier

      • loadMvt

        public static JtsMvt loadMvt(File file,
                             org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory geomFactory,
                             ITagConverter tagConverter,
                             MvtReader.RingClassifier ringClassifier)
                      throws IOException
        Convenience method for loading MVT from file. See loadMvt(InputStream, GeometryFactory, ITagConverter, RingClassifier).
        Parameters:
        file - path to the MVT
        geomFactory - allows for JTS geometry creation
        tagConverter - converts MVT feature tags to JTS user data object
        ringClassifier - determines how rings are parsed into Polygons and MultiPolygons
        Returns:
        JTS MVT with geometry in MVT coordinates
        Throws:
        IOException - failure reading MVT from path
        See Also:
        loadMvt(InputStream, GeometryFactory, ITagConverter, RingClassifier), Geometry, Geometry.getUserData(), MvtReader.RingClassifier

      • loadMvt

        public static JtsMvt loadMvt(InputStream is,
                             org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory geomFactory,
                             ITagConverter tagConverter)
                      throws IOException
        Load an MVT to JTS geometries using coordinates. Uses tagConverter to create user data from feature properties.
        Parameters:
        is - stream with MVT data
        geomFactory - allows for JTS geometry creation
        tagConverter - converts MVT feature tags to JTS user data object.
        Returns:
        JTS MVT with geometry in MVT coordinates
        Throws:
        IOException - failure reading MVT from stream
        See Also:
        Geometry, Geometry.getUserData(), MvtReader.RingClassifier

      • loadMvt

        public static JtsMvt loadMvt(InputStream is,
                             org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory geomFactory,
                             ITagConverter tagConverter,
                             MvtReader.RingClassifier ringClassifier)
                      throws IOException
        Load an MVT to JTS geometries using coordinates. Uses tagConverter to create user data from feature properties.
        Parameters:
        is - stream with MVT data
        geomFactory - allows for JTS geometry creation
        tagConverter - converts MVT feature tags to JTS user data object.
        ringClassifier - determines how rings are parsed into Polygons and MultiPolygons
        Returns:
        JTS MVT with geometry in MVT coordinates
        Throws:
        IOException - failure reading MVT from stream
        See Also:
        Geometry, Geometry.getUserData(), MvtReader.RingClassifier
